info.description:
### About Hugging Face

The AI community building the future.

### Prerequisites

- Postman Account
    
- Hugging Face Account: [https://huggingface.co/](https://huggingface.co/)
    

### Usage

1. Create a fork
    
2. Update collection variables
    
3. Send requests (on 503 due to model loading, wait and retry)
    

### Documentation

- API: [https://huggingface.co/docs/api-inference/index](https://huggingface.co/docs/api-inference/index)
    
- Models: [https://huggingface.co/models](https://huggingface.co/models)
